article.headline: (4) WAKE FOREST 98, NO CAROLINA A&T 76
article.story:
WINSTON-SALEM, North Carolina (Ticker) -- Justin Gray made it a 
short night for the Wake Forest starters.

Gray scored 21 of his 23 in the first half as No. 4 Wake Forest
extended its winning streak to six games with a 98-76 rout of
overmatched North Carolina A&T.

Needing 12 points to reach 1,000 for his career, Gray scored six
of the Demon Deacons' first seven points and achieved the
milestone by draining a 3-pointer with 13:10 left in the half to
put Wake Forest (11-1) ahead, 26-15.

That basket ignited a 24-7 run over the next nine minutes that
made it 47-22 with 4:24 remaining.

Gray made 6-of-9 shots, including 5-of-7 from the arc, as the
Demon Deacons shot 64 percent (21-of-33) to open a commanding
60-28 advantage at the break.

Gray made just two free throws and did not attempt a shot in the
second half, as Wake Forest coach Skip Prosser sat his starters
for most of the final 20 minutes.

Eric Williams scored 19 points and Chris Paul added 10 for Wake
Forest, which has won 45 of its last 46 home games in
non-conference play.  The Demon Deacons begin their Atlantic
Coast Conference schedule Sunday against Virginia.

Sean Booker scored 18 points for North Carolina A&T (1-11),
which has lost seven straight 36 of its last 40 games dating to
last season.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.
